warezcdn.name: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta...
warezcdn.title: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!

imdb.title: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
imdb.plot: A young girl dies and is reincarnated into a video game. But when she finds out that her role is the villainess destined for doom, she takes measures to change the game and avoid that fate.

episodes.title: I Avoided My Doom Flags, So I Got Carried Away at the Cultural Festival...
episodes.plot: Catarina is enjoying having avoided her doom flags, and goes to enjoy a cultural festival with her friends. But a new danger to avoid is soon to arrive.

episodes.title: I Turned Into a Villain...
episodes.plot: Everyone takes part in a play, with Catarina reluctantly cast in the villainess role. When she forgets her lines and starts improvising, she sends the play off the rails.

episodes.title: I Was Put in Captivity...
episodes.plot: Catarina is a prisoner. While she tries to find out what's going on, her friends make plans and inquiries on the same purpose.

episodes.title: I Had a Friendly Tea Time with An Attractive Butler
episodes.plot: Catarina has a meal with her captor and learns of his past, and slowly he is drawn to her.

episodes.title: The Love for my Younger Brothers Has Overflowed...
episodes.plot: While everybody clings to Catarina to protect her, Geoffrey thinks back on his relationship with his family.

episodes.title: I Had a Summer Adventure...
episodes.plot: Catarina and her friends think back to a memorable childhood summer.

episodes.title: My Wish Has Come True...
episodes.plot: Catarina and her friends get sucked into an enchanted dollhouse that lets them live out their dreams.

episodes.title: I Had an Arranged Marriage Meeting...
episodes.plot: Nicol has several meetings with potential brides in an attempt to move on from Catarina. A meeting with one candidate changes him.

episodes.title: OVA: I Met My Destined One...

episodes.title: I Recalled the Memories of My Past Life...
episodes.plot: Catarina gets a bump on the head, and remembers her past life. Now realizing her role in the setup, she plans to avoid all the routes that lead to doom, starting with helping her stepbrother Keith and her fiance Geordo.

episodes.title: A Prince Challenged Me to a Fight...
episodes.plot: Catarina befriends her rival Mary and her fiance's brother Alan.

episodes.title: Met a Beautiful Brother and Sister...
episodes.plot: Catarina befriends Sophia Ascart, a fan of romance novels, and her handsome brother Nicol.

episodes.title: I Enrolled in the Magic Academy...
episodes.plot: Catarina enters a magical academy.

episodes.title: I Visited the Heroine's Parents' House...
episodes.plot: Catarina visits the home of her nemesis, Maria Campbell, to see what she is like.

episodes.title: I Had Fun Over Summer Vacation...
episodes.plot: Everyone enjoys their summer vacation.

episodes.title: Will He Come at Me As Well?
episodes.plot: Sophia has a dream about Atsuko Sasaki, Catarina's friend in the real world who was saddened by her sudden death. As part of their practical exams, everyone is tasked with entering a dangerous dungeon for a magic stone, with Catarina on a team with Geordo, Keith, and Sophia. During the chaos of one of the dungeon's traps, which Catarina sets off by accident, Catarina ends up falling down into a hidden passage, where she unknowingly finds the magic stone while harvesting mushrooms. Guided by Nicol's wind magic, Sophia comes to Catarina's rescue when she almost falls ...

episodes.title: I Became Engulfed By Desire...
episodes.plot: While studying in the library, Catarina and several others get sucked inside a magic book. Mary and Maria find that the only way to free them is to let one of them fulfill their desires within the book world, but Mary is unable to let them play out to the end since they all involve everyone hitting on Catarina. Realizing that none of the stories have involved Catarina's desire, the two let a scenario play out in which Catarina gets to eat sweets, a desire that proves too much for the book to contain, freeing everyone as a result.

episodes.title: Things Got Crazy at a Slumber Party...
episodes.plot: As Catarina and the girls hold a slumber party to celebrate passing their exams, her maid Anne Shelley notices everyone's feelings towards Catarina that she herself is oblivious of. A flashback reveals how Anne, the daughter of Baron and his maid, was scarred in a fire that took her mother's life and was deemed unfit for marriage by her father. Upon joining the Claes family, she originally tried to act as merely a tool until Catarina's personality changed following her accident, after which she learned to be herself. When Anne's father tried to marry Anne off, ...

episodes.title: The Moment of My Doom Arrived... Part 1
episodes.plot: Mimicking the judgment event from the game where she is subjugated for her crimes, Catarina is accused of bullying Maria, but Maria and the others vouch for her innocence (and slightly insulting her). Although Catarina is relieved that she has evaded a major doom flag, Maria goes missing after investigating a dark aura coming off the instigators. Three days later, Geordo discovers that the list of "evidence" the instigators used against Catarina wasn't actually written by them, and that they themselves have no memory of why they accused her. He suspects that they were...

episodes.title: The Moment of My Doom Arrived... Part 2
episodes.plot: A young school girl wakes up to find that she is late for school. Today, she is meeting with her best friend to talk about her quest to conquer the dark-hearted Prince Geordo Stuart.

episodes.title: The Final Event Has Begun...
episodes.plot: Sirius, whose real name is revealed to be Raphael Walt, explains how Marchioness Dieke, mother of the real Sirius who was sick, had a mage kill his mother to acquire dark magic and transfer Sirius' memories into his body, before murdering him to keep him quiet. Gaining dark magic alongside Sirius' memories while retaining his own, Raphael swore to get revenge on the one who killed his mother. Reminded of his mother's kindness thanks to Catarina's help, Raphael learns that the true dark magic was the mage that possessed him following his death and finally manages to ...
